profile.name: Tanner Linsley
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | @tanstack & @nozzle
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with a passion for building scalable, performant applications. Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Tailwind-in-JS.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer | @tanstack & @nozzle
description: Designed and implemented global async server-state management for a high-traffic application.
Developed a concise API for exploratory data visualization, resulting in improved performance and user experience.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Built custom applications using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind-in-JS for clients across the globe.
Collaborated with teams to deliver high-quality solutions on time and within budget.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of multiple open-source projects, including bug fixes and feature enhancements.
Engaged with the community through issues, pull requests, and discussions.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom applications using JavaScript, React, and Tailwind-in-JS for clients.
Delivered high-quality solutions on time and within budget.
